# probmed: Probabilistic Effect Sizes for Mediation Analysis

Compute P_med, a scale-free probabilistic effect size for causal mediation.


## Quick Example

```r
library(probmed)

# Simulate data
set.seed(123)
n <- 300
data <- data.frame(X = rnorm(n), C = rnorm(n))
data$M <- 0.5 * data$X + 0.3 * data$C + rnorm(n)
data$Y <- 0.4 * data$M + 0.2 * data$X + 0.2 * data$C + rnorm(n)

# Compute P_med
result <- pmed(
  Y ~ X + M + C,
  formula_m = M ~ X + C,
  data = data,
  treatment = "X",
  mediator = "M",
  method = "parametric_bootstrap",
  n_boot = 1000
)

print(result)
summary(result)
plot(result)
```
